Interface CsvHandler<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object this handler processes
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationCsvHandler, InternshipCsvHandler
public interface CsvHandler<T>
Interface for converting objects to CSV format. Implementations provide object-to-CSV serialization and deserialization logic.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default String
    escapeCSV(String s)
    Escape commas and quotes in CSV strings.
    String
    formatCsvLine(T object)
    Convert an object to CSV line format.
    void
    loadFromCsv()
    Load data from CSV file into memory.
    void
    saveToCsv(T obj)
    Save an object to CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromCsv

      void loadFromCsv()
      Load data from CSV file into memory. Each implementation loads its specific object type.

    • saveToCsv

      void saveToCsv(T obj)
      Save an object to CSV file.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to save

    • formatCsvLine

      String formatCsvLine(T object)
      Convert an object to CSV line format.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to convert
      Returns:
      CSV formatted string

    • escapeCSV

      default String escapeCSV(String s)
      Escape commas and quotes in CSV strings. Default helper method for all CSV handlers.
      Parameters:
      s - the string to escape
      Returns:
      the escaped string
